sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SEPIARIÆ, (from ſepes, “ a hedge”), the name of the 44th order of Linnaeus’s Fragments of a Natural
Method, conſiſting of a beautiful collection of woody plants, some of which, from their ſize and elegance, are very proper furniture for hedges. See Botany, p. 467.
